mulin mulin nam apata hamuwune mudu bim thiruwak.eeth tiken tika kale dadi wenna patan gaththa.karaththa para depasama wasagena pathirena batagas, kandukara wananthara shaka, nakals kalapaye sulabha enasal panduru walin chanda hiru ras thiru pera dama thibuna.polawe diya sirawa nisa ape pirisata siduwune parissamin adiya thiyamin issarahata yanna.punchi punchi sarpayan, gemban saha kudallan nirantharawa pare idakada ahuragena sitiya.

karunakara ayis kata watena kalaya kar pothak lesa salakimen walakinna. 2000 dashakaye mul bhagaye sita sahithya sanwada asse mandamandawa gawasunu, wibhawiye apuru punchi sakachcha walata sahabhagi wu, athe thibu thuttu deka wiyadam karagena poth miladigena kiyawu, kawada ho siriyas sahithyakarayeku wannata sihina dutu pudgalayekuge pothak lesa sitha meya soyaganna.

ee samangama dasa dahasakata adhika pirisakata yalith warak rakiya awastha udawi thibena athara eya rate wirakiyawa awamakara ganimata hethuwak wana bawada aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha pawasayi.me yatathe adu aadayamlabhi pawul 30,000ka niwasawala wahalata ulu sewili kirime wyapruthiya sadaha awashya ulu pramanayen miliyana 20 kata adhika ulu pramanayak diwi nanguma wadasatahana mangin danatamath labagena athi bawa penwadena amathiwaraya wennappuwa, katana saha katugampola aasanayanhi pradhana washayen ulu kamhal 312k pawathina bawada eyin 256 k kuda parimanaye kamhal bawada sandahan karayi.ema kamhalwala yuro, kalikat saha mudun ulu nishpadanaya karana athara ese wasa damana lada ulu kamhalwalin diwi nanguma wadasatahana yatathe ulu miladi ganimath samanga yalith nishpadana katayuthu aarambha kirimata hakiwa thibena bawada aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya penwadeyi.shià·Šra lankawe ulu karmantha thula srujuwama rakiyawe nirathawana sankhyawa 7,250k wana athara wakrawa rakiyawe nirathawana sankhyawa 15,000ki.

ema paniwidaye wadiduratath meseda dakwe.ada dina eedul - fithar uthsawaya samarana islam bathimathun wetha ma mema suba pathum paniwudaya ewanne imahath sathutini.islam dahame sampradayayata anuwa yamin bhakthimath upawasaya saha wenath aagamika wathawathwala yedime suwisheshi kalaya sampurna kirima samarimata shri lankika muslim prajawa ada lowa pura sitina islam sahodara sahodariyan samanga ek wethi.shuddha wu kuranaye ha shuddha wu muhammadthumage iganwimwalata anuwa yamin aagamanukula upawasaye yedima aadhyathmika watinakamwalata gambaurin awadhanaya yomu kirima, yagnyawa ha kapawima wani aagamika piliwethhi yedena shuddha wu masayaka awasanaya wana me awasthawa uthsawa pawathwime kalayayi.shri lankawe muslim janaya siyawas gananawak pura ape rate anek janawargika ha aagamika prajawan samanga samagiyen jiwath wu aakarayata pasugiya masaye mema piliwethhi niyalunaha.
pasugiya okthobar masaye sita adala mulya prathipadana amathyanshayata labi nomathi bawa ema amathyanshaye wiganana anshaye niladhariyeku sandahan kaleya.
